text: Here Comes the Boom is a 2012 American comedy movie directed by Frank Coraci and starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek, Henry Winkler, Greg Germann, Joe Rogan, Gary Valentine, Bas Rutten, Reggie Lane, Melissa Peterman, Bruce Buffer. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:2012 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Coraci
title: Here Comes the Boom
